post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
The company I am working at is looking to hire additional developers.

Telecommunication
**** 1. Device Agent Developer:
Wireless development experience (J2ME, WindowsCE, Symbian, embedded linux)

2. Backend Developer:
J2EE (JMS, EJB, JBoss, WebLogic,...), XDoclet, XML, DHTML, javascript, Oracle (8i, 9i), mysql, jakarta technologies (log4j, ant, struts, taglibs, velocity, oro), CVS

3. System Integration/Professional Service

4. Quality Assurance Analyst

If you are a good fit and interested in this position, please forward your resume to me.
I will arrange to setup an interview.

fkwon@mobiledx.com
www.mobiledx.com
post.title: Looking for Java Developers
